entry.content:
This is an understandable sentiment. As jobs push people to be automatons and often offer little in the way of respect, itâ€™s easy to quietly quit.

But perhaps, theyâ€™re not paying you enough to not care.

Spending your days, day after day, not caring is a tragedy.

They might not deserve your focus and effort, but you do.
